title: England's Struggles Continue
description:
The FC crew react to the United States' 2-0 loss to Japan in their penultimate game before the World Cup and question why Gregg Berhalter didn't try to alter his system during the game. Plus, the guys break down England's loss to Italy, argue if Gareth Southgate is the right man to manage the Three Lions and discuss if England is at risk of failing to get out of group play.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: England relegated from Nations League A; Germany fall to Hungary, Brazil dominate Ghana in friendly
